description: An illustration of a caravan, also known as a travel trailer, similar to that of the Airstream model; it is made up of varying shades of purple. There is one window at the front of the caravan (on the right side of the picture) and one window at the back with two thin mirrors stacked one atop the other to the left of the open door. The hitch of the caravan is in the front.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.

content: March 13, 2022. Go off with a hitch. #NYTVertex
